info.title: BCH RPC NodeChain API
info.description: Docs relating to the BCH RPC API, including the connection to the API of the native node. Its goal is to give the user an easy way to be able to raise their own nodes for use with the native Swapper application.

post.summary: Return the balance of any address
post.description: Return the balance of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressBalance

post.summary: Return the balance of an array of addresses
post.description: Return the balance of an array of addresses

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesBalance

post.summary: Return the transaction history of any address
post.description: Return the transaction history of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressHistory

post.summary: Return the transaction history of the given addresses
post.description: Return the transaction history of the given addresses

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesHistory

post.description: Returns latest block hash and index
post.summary: Returns latest block hash and index

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getHeight

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its hash. If verbosity is 0, it returns a string that is serialized, hex-encoded data for block hash. If verbosity is 1, it returns an object with information about the block. If verbosity is 2, it returns an Object with information about the block and each transaction
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getBlockByHash

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its height. If verbosity is 0, it returns a string that is serialized, hex-encoded data for block hash. If verbosity is 1, it returns an object with information about the block. If verbosity is 2, it returns an Object with information about the block and each transaction
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its height

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getBlockByNumber

post.description: Returns True if blocks are syncing and returns False if theres no synchronization or is fully sychronize

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be syncing

post.summary: Returns the information of any transaction
post.description: Returns the information of any transaction, giving its transaction hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransaction

post.summary: Returns the information of an array of transactions
post.description: Returns the information of an array of transaction, giving its transactions hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransactions

post.summary: Watch an address. Everytime the address changes, a http POST is sent to the URL.
post.description: Watch an address. Everytime the address changes, a http POST is sent to the URL.

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be notify

post.summary: Returns the number of pending or confirmed transactions an address has made
post.description: Returns the number of pending or confirmed transactions an address has made

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressTransactionCount

post.summary: Returns the information of any transaction
post.description: Returns the information of any transaction, giving it transaction hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesTransactionCount

post.description: Estimates the approximate fee per kilobyte needed for a transaction to begin confirmation within "confirmations" blocks if possible and return the number of blocks for which the estimate is valid.

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getFeePerByte

post.description: Returns the UTXO list of any address
post.summary: Returns the UTXO list of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressUnspent

post.description: Returns the UTXO list of an array of addresses
post.summary: Returns the UTXO list of an array of addresses

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesUnspent

post.description: Returns raw schema of any transaction. If verbosity is set to true, transaction object is returned, otherwise raw transaction will be returned

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransactionHex

post.summary: Broadcasts a transaction to the network
post.description: Broadcasts a transaction to the network

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be broadcastTransaction
